full_summary:
================
**Tender Announcement**

**Title**
---------
W0135-22SA01 - Tailoring Services for CFB North Bay

**Reference Number**
-------------------
WS4085749543

**Publication and Closing Dates**
-------------------------------
* Publication Date: **July 12, 2023**
* Tender Closing Date: **July 31, 2023** at 14:00 EDT

**Contract Details**
-------------------
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) seeks offers to provide tailoring services for the 22 Wing CFB North Bay. The Contract period is three (3) years, inclusive of the award date, with options to extend for two (2) additional one-year periods.

**Description of Services**
-------------------------
The successful contractor will provide all necessary labour, materials, and equipment to deliver tailoring services for the Department of National Defence (DND) at CFB North Bay. The Statement of Work outlines the specific requirements for service delivery.

**Contact Information**
---------------------
Any inquiries or submissions should be directed to:
Andrew Denbeigh, SPAC/PSPC
Email: [andrew.denbeigh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:andrew.denbeigh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**NOTING THE FOLLOWING**
------------------------

* All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by 14:00 EDT on July 31, 2023.
* Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.
* The successful contractor will be responsible for all necessary labour, materials, and equipment to deliver the services.

You can find the full details on the Government of Canada’s [Tendering and Bidding website](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement=dictatingbuying/solicitations/index-eng.asp) or on the Ariba Discovery platform. Please be aware that this tender is [**cancelled**]. <del>As per the specific tender conditions, only registered contractors who have taken necessary steps in preparation to offer the necessary services are at liberty to register their company via the available on-line sourcing tool or NextGenPortal – which exclusively constitute binding bids to get announced.</del> 

If you aren't sure about any of this, feel free to ask, I can amend this document and save it for you. 

( And don't forget I can also refactor the original text too, in order to allow you to validate the readings/ translations ! )
